attributes.action: Have more resources to help graduates find a secure job in their passion.
attributes.additional_details: I want facilities for students who may not be getting attention from teachers, who may lack experience in the field they want to pursue, who may want advice on how to achieve their dreams. I want a service where I can help people like myself pursue their real ambitions whether its AI, career in Space, Business analyst, Marketing, Data Science - anything which students would rather decline and choose hair dressing/ travel and tourism instead due to society. I want my voice to be heard.
attributes.background: As a business graduate, I realised if you did not come from a affluent area of high school you are set for failure because you are told you have to be realistic and not good enough to aim high. I want to help students to achieve their dreams and be the best of their ability. I want more facilities!

rejection.details:
We understand you'd like better careers advice and guidance for students, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government and Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
